eonir.name: Parliament Guard
equipment: Mooncleaver Falchion (S+2, AP-1, Cleaving Blow, Two Hands)
specialRules: Shrouded in Mist: Natural 6s To Hit must be re-rolled
Stances – Heavenly Headsmen: Killing Blow OR Harvesters of Fear: Ld test at -1, +1A on fail
eonir.notes: Anti-Cavalry Assassin. High WS/I strike before Knights.

eonir.name: Ironbark Sentinels
equipment: Kurnous Greatbow (32", S6, AP-2, Quick Shot, Multiple Wounds 2, Bramble-Barbs)
specialRules: Tree Spirit: Regen 5+, Flammable, Immune to Psychology, Move Through Cover
Bramble-Barbs: Behemoth/Monster/Monstrous taking wounds get -1M permanently (min 1)
eonir.notes: Zone Control. Snipe Monsters with S6 AP-2 and slow them.

eonir.name: Knights of the Savage Drake
specialRules: 0-1 Per Army. Gareth must join and cannot leave.
Close Order, Fear, Swiftstride, Move Through Cover, Stubborn
Anath Raema's Red Blessing: If unit causes unsaved wounds, ALL models gain +1A for rest of combat
eonir.notes: Anvil & Hammer. High Wounds (4 combined) and escalating attacks via Red Blessing.

eonir.name: Gareth
equipment: Heavy Armour (5+ Save — via Black Plates of Ilmennath)
Asrai Longbow (R32", S:User, AP1, Armour Bane 1, Volley Fire)
Huarath — Claw and Fang (S user, AP-2, Armour Bane 2), Armoured Hide (2+)
specialRules: Predator's Fury: Hatred (all enemies) on a turn Huarath charged
Fight for Dominance: Before deployment, mark one enemy unit. +1 To Hit and +1 To Wound vs that unit
Huarath: Terror, First Charge, Stomp (1), Swiftstride, Move Through Cover

relic.name: Black Plates of Ilmennath (Celestial Ruin)
relic.basicForm: Heavy Armour (5+ save). Regeneration (Scaling): starts 6+; improves to 5+ after 2 unsaved wounds caused; improves to 4+ after 4 unsaved wounds caused (cumulative across battle, permanent). Empowered State (unlocked at 4+): Daemonic Vessel — Bound Spell PL2, cast on 2D6+2. Range Self. Until end of turn: wearer, mount, and joined unit gain +1S, +1A (max 10), and +1AP on all weapons.
relic.upgradedForm: All Basic Form rules. Daemonic Vessel upgrades to PL3, cast on 2D6+3 (same effect). Broken Morale Aura (always active): one chosen enemy unit within 12" of Gareth cannot use their General's Inspiring Presence.

eonir.notes: Must join Knights of the Savage Drake. Mount: Huarath (65pts, Monstrous Cavalry, 50x100 base).

eonir.name: Daedilae
equipment: Spear of Loec (Combat, S+1, AP-1, Armour Bane 2, Killing Blow)
specialRules: Loner (may join Daedilae's Guard, Parliament Guard, Wardancers freely)
Flawless Partner (shares Dance/Stance/Choreography of joined unit)

relic.name: Fëalana (Willbreaker)
relic.basicForm: Har Ganeth Greatsword: S+2, AP-1, Cleaving Blow, Requires Two Hands. Punishing Riposte: whenever an enemy in base contact rolls a natural 1 to hit against Daedilae in close combat, she immediately makes 1 Attack back against that model's unit using her normal profile and Willbreaker's rules. Maximum one Riposte per Combat phase. Aura of Broken Will: enemy Wizards within 9" suffer -1 to Casting rolls (applied after all other modifiers).
relic.upgradedForm: All Basic Form rules. Punishing Riposte (Enhanced): no longer limited to once per Combat phase — Daedilae makes a Riposte Attack for each natural 1 rolled against her. Aura of Broken Will (Enhanced): range increased to 18".

eonir.notes: Uses High Priestess of Kul Anar profile. May join Daedilae's Guard (Parliament Guard), Wardancers freely.

upgrades.name: Spirit Mount — Mist-Hawk
mountRules: Shrouded in Mist: Natural 6s To Hit must be re-rolled

upgrades.name: Lothaqshynin (Forest Dragon)
mountEquipment: Serrated Maw (Combat, S, -, Armour Bane 2, Multiple Wounds 2; must use one attack per turn)
Soporific Breath (N/A, S2, N/A – Breath Weapon; no Armour save vs. wounds)

eonir.name: Dûgalathir (Watcher of the Void)
equipment: Indolair — Double Voulge (Two-handed, S+1, Armour Bane 1)
specialRules: Tree Spirit (Regen 5+, Flammable, Immune to Psychology, Move Through Cover)

relic.name: Indolair (Hungering Heart)
relic.basicForm: Double Voulge (Two-handed, S+1, Armour Bane 1). Twin-Bladed Hunger: bearer gains +1 Attack. Call of the Dark Woods: bearer may cast Tree Singing as Bound Spell PL2. Place a 3" template within 15" — treated as woodland, enemy units treat it as Dangerous Terrain. Watcher's Vigilance: whilst within 3" of a woodland feature, Dispel range increases by 3".
relic.upgradedForm: All Basic Form rules. Ravenous Assault: bearer gains +2 Attacks (replaces +1). Song of the Shadowed Grove: Tree Singing upgrades to Bound Spell PL3, large (5") template. Sentinel of the Void: within 3" of woodland, Dispel range +3" AND roll an extra D6 on Dispel rolls, discarding the lowest.

eonir.name: Elenornath (Watcher of the Stars)
specialRules: Tree Spirit (Regen 5+, Flammable, Immune to Psychology, Move Through Cover)

relic.name: Elenraith (Star-Shower)
relic.basicForm: Shield Passive: bearer reduces all Multiple Wounds suffered by 1 (minimum 1). Single Use — Celestial Fire: once per battle, place a 3" template within 24". All models under it suffer S4 AP-1 hit with Magical Attacks and Flaming Attacks. The struck area becomes Difficult Terrain until the start of the player's next turn.
relic.upgradedForm: Shield Passive (Enhanced): bearer reduces all Multiple Wounds by 1 (minimum 1). Additionally, if bearer would be slain by a Monster Slayer wound, instead reduce remaining Wounds to half starting value (round up) and bearer may still attempt Regeneration saves. Two Uses — Celestial Fire: twice per battle (same effect as Basic Form).

relic.name: Nethu's Claw
relic.basicForm: An ivory ring of fused finger bones. The wearer gains a 5+ ward save. The wearer may always allocate attacks against enemy characters, ignoring the Look Out, Sir! rule.
relic.upgradedForm: All Basic Form rules (5+ ward save, ignore Look Out Sir on character allocation). Once per game, the wearer may use the Hidden special rule to re-hide (as if deploying again).

upgrades.name: Repeater Crossbow
upgrades.description: Range 24", S4, Multiple Shots (2), Quick to Fire.

upgrades.name: Cloak of Twilight
upgrades.description: +2 to Armour Save in the first round of combat.

upgrades.name: Dark Venom
upgrades.description: The wielder's attacks cause a -1 modifier to the target's Toughness (min 1) on each unsaved wound.

upgrades.name: Manbane
upgrades.description: The wielder's attacks gain Multiple Wounds (2) against non-Large targets.

upgrades.name: Rending Stars
upgrades.description: Missile weapon. Range 12", S3, AP-1. Up to 2 thrown per Shooting phase.

eonir.name: Caerwynne
equipment: Spear of Loec (Combat, S+1, AP-1, Armour Bane 2, Killing Blow)
specialRules: Flawless Partner (shares Dance/Stance/Choreography of joined unit)

relic.name: Laurels of Thalgil (Shifting Stars)
relic.basicForm: Constant — Pathwalker's Grace: Caerwynne and any joined unit gain Swiftstride. Single Use — The Shifting Path (Command phase only): Caerwynne and her joined unit teleport to any location on the battlefield (not within 8" of enemy models). Caerwynne must pass a Leadership test; if failed, the unit scatters D6" in a random direction. If scatter would place unit within 1" of enemy or impassable terrain, the teleport fails and the use is expended. After teleporting, the unit cannot move again this Movement phase but may act normally otherwise.
relic.upgradedForm: Constant — Pathwalker's Blessing: Caerwynne and joined unit gain Swiftstride and First Charge (always active). Single Use — The Trickster's Path: same teleport rules as Basic Form. The Dual-Masked Dance: after successfully teleporting, in their next combat phase the unit may choose TWO of the four Dances of Loec simultaneously: Whirling Death (AP+2), Storm of Blades (+1 Attack), The Shadows Coil (4+ ward vs wounds), Woven Mist (enemies -1 to hit). Both dances active for that combat phase only. If the unit doesn't enter combat before the next Movement phase, this benefit is lost.

eonir.notes: Uses High Priestess of Kul Anar profile. May join Wardancers freely.

eonir.name: Glade Lord
equipment: Asrai Longbow (R32", S:User, AP 1, Armour Bane 1, Volley Fire)
eonir.notes: Mount: Elven Steed, Great Stag, Warhawk, Great Eagle, Forest Dragon. Kindred, Magic Items (100pts), Enchanted Arrows, Forest Sprites.

eonir.name: Glade Captain
eonir.notes: Mount: Elven Steed, Great Stag, Warhawk, Great Eagle. May be BSB. Magic Items (50pts).

eonir.name: Spellweaver
eonir.notes: Lores: Battle Magic, Elementalism, Illusion, Lore of the Wilds. Mount: Elven Steed, Warhawk, Great Eagle, Unicorn. Magic Items (100pts).

eonir.name: Spellsinger
eonir.notes: Lores: Battle Magic, Elementalism, Illusion, Lore of the Wilds. Mount: Elven Steed, Warhawk, Great Eagle, Unicorn. Magic Items (50pts).

eonir.name: Shadowdancer
eonir.notes: Optional Wizard Lvl 1. Lores: Battle Magic, Illusion, Lore of the Wilds. Magic Items (50pts). Dances of Loec when joined to Wardancers.

eonir.name: Waystalker
eonir.notes: May take: AHW, Light Armour. Magic Items (50pts). Enchanted Arrows, Forest Sprites.

eonir.name: Branchwraith
eonir.notes: Lores: Battle Magic, Elementalism, Illusion, Lore of the Wilds. Magic Items (50pts).

eonir.name: Treeman Ancient
eonir.notes: Lores: Battle Magic, Elementalism, Lore of the Wilds, Lore of Athel Cythrel. Magic Items (100pts).

eonir.name: Wardens of Talsyn
eonir.notes: Hosts of Talsyn. May be BSB. Magic Items (50pts).

eonir.name: Orion, the King in the Woods
equipment: Spear of Loec (S+1, AP-1, AB2, Killing Blow)
eonir.notes: Named. 0-1 per army. 2D6 Hounds of Orion.

eonir.name: Araloth, Lord of Talsyn
eonir.notes: Named. Hosts of Talsyn. Counts as Glade Lord.

eonir.name: Khainite Assassin (Rephal)
eonir.notes: Dark Elf datasheet for Rephal. Magic Items (50pts). Options: Repeater Xbows +3, AHW +3, Light Armour +5, Cloak of Twilight +15, Dark Venom +15.

upgrades.name: Dark Venom
upgrades.description: Attacks with this poison cause a -1 modifier to the target's Toughness characteristic (minimum 1) on unsaved wounds.

upgrades.name: Manbane
upgrades.description: The wielder's attacks gain the Multiple Wounds (2) special rule against non-Large targets.

upgrades.name: Rending Stars
upgrades.description: Missile weapon. Range 12", S3, AP-1. The model may throw up to 2 Rending Stars per Shooting phase.

eonir.name: High Priestess of Kul Anar
equipment: Spear of Loec (Combat, S+1, AP-1, Armour Bane 2, Killing Blow)
specialRules: Loner (Kult of Kul Anar — may join Daedilae's Guard, Cult Acolytes, Wardancers only)
Flawless Partner (shares Dance/Stance/Choreography of joined unit)
eonir.notes: Eonir Narrative Campaign — Kult of Kul Anar. May join Daedilae's Guard, Cult Acolytes, and Wardancers freely.

eonir.notes: Enchanted Arrows.
